scripts.test_dev_chrome_headed: cross-env ENV_NAME=dev npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome"--headed
scripts.test_demo_chrome_headed: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome" --headed
scripts.test_dev_edge_headed: cross-env ENV_NAME =dev npx playwright test --project="Microsoft Edge" --headed
scripts.test_demo_edge_headed: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo npx playwright test --project="Microsoft Edge" --headed
scripts.test_uat_chrome_headed: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome" --headed --grep=@uat
scripts.test_dev_tag_chrome_headed: cross-env ENV_NAME=dev npx playwright test --project="Google Chrome" --headed --grep=@dev
